rooms.description: An open reception area with a foyer that adheres to Vastu by positioning the entrance in the south-east corner for prosperity.
Spacious bedroom designed with floor-to-ceiling windows on the east wall to invite morning light and adhere to Vastu principles.
Functional bedroom with minimalistic design reflecting Brutalist aesthetics. Windows are strategically placed following local norms.
A combined space featuring an open layout. The living area is centered with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall to enhance natural light.
An acoustically designed home theater integrated into the open-plan living area, with soundproof panels and ambient lighting.
A compact space for laundry and storage, designed according to building norms while maintaining an uncluttered layout.

openings.description: A robust entrance in keeping with Brutalist style and Vastu principles ensuring energy flow.
Large window designed for maximum light and ventilation in accordance with local building norms.
Open-plan living area window ensuring a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
A sliding door for flexible space use and easy movement between functional areas.
